de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISProfile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISOperator

    public interface ISProfile
extends ISCommon
    see ICProfile
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getProfileAPI().getOperator(con, profile);

      • storeAllKeywordActions

        boolean storeAllKeywordActions(Connection con,
                             Profile operator,
                             boolean keywords)
                               throws SQLException
        Stores all the keyword actions (KeywordAction).
        Parameters:
        con - the connection
        operator - the Profile
        keywords - false - the actions are deleted from the profile, true - the actions are inserted into the profile
        Returns:
        true if the process was successful
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
        storeAllSchlagworte

      • findProfile

        List<Profile> findProfile(Connection con,
                        String name,
                        String subproject)
                          throws SQLException
        Searches for the Profiles. The name isn't empty -> the profile name is used in the request The subproject isn't empty -> the responsibility is used in the request
        Parameters:
        con - the connection
        name - the profile name
        subproject - the Subproject
        Returns:
        list of the Profiles
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
        sucheProfil

      • findProfile

        List<Profile> findProfile(Connection con,
                        String name,
                        String subproject,
                        boolean loadDetail)
                          throws SQLException
        Searches for the Profiles. The name isn't empty -> the profile name is used in the request The subproject isn't empty -> the responsibility is used in the request
        Parameters:
        con - the connection
        name - the profile name
        subproject - the Subproject
        loadDetail - add permission and keyword details to the result
        Returns:
        list of the Profiles
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
        sucheProfil

      • getOperatorIds

        List<Integer> getOperatorIds(Connection con,
                           List<Integer> profilIds)
                             throws SQLException
        Every operator can have profiles, which are assigned to them,
        this method makes it easy to get the ids of the corresponding operators.

        See also the other way around: de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server.ISOperator#getProfileIds()
        Parameters:
        con - a SQL Connection.
        profilIds - from which to get from the operator ids.
        Returns:
        the as List with the corresponding operator ids.
        Throws:
        SQLException
